text: Explain the difference between controlled and uncontrolled components in React.
How would you optimize the performance of a React application?
Explain the concept of middleware in Express.js and provide an example.
options: Middleware functions are functions that have access to the request and response objects
Middleware functions can only be used for authentication
Middleware functions cannot modify the request and response objects

text: How would you handle authentication in a Node.js application?
options: Authentication is not necessary in Node.js applications
